nodes.text: Darth Sidious's Meditation Chamber was located in the EmPal SuRecon center.

A small, circular room adjoined to the operating theater by thick transparisteel windows, this room closely resembled Palpatine's former office in the Republic Executive Building. On one side of the room were a semicircle of padded couches, on the other three shell-shaped swivel chairs. In the center and on the sides of the room were three conical holoprojectors.
